alert.note: Alert for Wicomico; Worcester (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 16 at 6:44PM EDT until May 16 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL WICOMICO AND NORTHEASTERN WORCESTER COUNTIES... At 644 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Newark, or 12 miles west of Ocean City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Berlin and Ocean Pines around 655 PM EDT. Cape Isle Of Wight around 700 PM EDT. Ocean City around 705 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bishop, West Ocean City, Ocean City Municipality, Bishopville, Powellville, Ironshire, Showell, Whaleyville, Whiton and Willards. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
